article_title: Can Obamacare Improve Patient Safety? Tort Reform Hasn't.

article_metadata.description: The goal of Obamacare is to make healthcare available to everyone. Access and affordability are the keywords that come up in any internet search.  Implicit in that promise is “quality” care.  Unfortunately, the quest for improved patient safety has been subsumed in the din of partisan bickering.  And that, sadly, [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Cohen
